name: shop-meetingapi
description: Package	Purpose Flask	Core web framework Flask-Cors	Enable CORS for cross-origin requests Flask-SQLAlchemy	ORM for working with PostgreSQL psycopg2-binary	PostgreSQL driver python-dotenv	Load environment variables from .env file PyJWT	JSON Web Token encoding/decoding requests	Send HTTP requests (e.g., calling other services) python-dateutil	Better date handling (timestamps, etc.)
